bug.short_desc: Parent Jobs should go to the End of the 'extend' List

long_desc.thetext:
Job shadowing is implemented by adding the shadowed job to the 'extend' list of the shadowing job. Currently the parent is automatically inserted at the front of this list. As a consequence, settings already existing jobs in this list - although explicitly given by the user! - get lower precedence over the same settings of the parent. This means that they cannot override settings in the parent, which is counter-intuitive.
I think the parent should get lower precedence as preexisting 'extend' members, and should therefore go to the end of the list.
This could have effects on existing configs.
